alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 25 at 2:59AM PST until February 26 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 3 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 33 will result in frost formation. For the Wind Advisory, areas of north to northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected, strongest in the north and west valley. * WHERE...San Fernando Valley. * WHEN...For the Frost Advisory, until 9 AM PST this morning. For the Wind Advisory, from 3 AM to 3 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Frost can damage sensitive plants and harm pets if left unprotected.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley
